name: John Connor
description: River Flavors Ocean Myst is the star here.  The FA Fuji adds nice tartness and apple flavor.
author: frings_demise

reviews.text: Nicotine River (River Flavors) Ocean Myst is p4p the best pure grape out there and underutilized. I mixed this up pretty much 1:1 ages ago so I'm familiar with it. I dropped the Fuji down a bit as it's too harsh for me that high and added .3 cactus and ws-23 for coolant/juicy making it a Grack'ish type of mix. Good Job here.
